text: E'ina hu'negu tamagra antahisazana rumo'za haviza hu'naze hutma refko huzmante gahazanagi, tamagranena anahukna hutma havi vahe mani'nazankitma mago'a kea osugahaze. Tamagrama rumokizamigu'ma havi vahe mani'nazanki'za zamata erigahaze hutama huzmantesazana, tamagranena anahukna hu'nazankino, tamagri'enena anazanke hurmantegahie. Na'ankure rumofoma refko nehamoka, kagranena ana hukna hu'nane.
